data.reason: LL-link down in frame FR007 cage CG03 (superNode SN001 drawer DR0) (Llocal Link Port Down)
data.recommendation:
There is a problem with a hub chip.
Record the alert ID.
Call IBM Service.
Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.
